name: RoboDepot
description:
Try to sort the robot parts as quick as you can!

This game was made as part of the Extra Credits Game Jam #3.

Introduction

The year is 2258. The name of the place is RoboDepot. It is humanity’s last, best hope for resource conservation.

Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to sort the robot parts into correct bins. The faster you complete your mission, the more likely you will conserve more resources and get more points.

Press the key shown on the pusher, or click on the pusher to push the parts into the correct bin. Each part correctly sorted will give you 10 points. In addition, you can earn bonus points for finishing the level quickly.

Acknowledgements

This game uses music from Kevin MacLeod, fonts from Natanael Gama, a background image from SpaceX and sound effects from Freesound and SoundBible.
